item.title: [KEERTHI] Keerthi Industries Confirms Status of Share Transfer Requests Under SEBI Special Window
item.description:
Keerthi Industries Ltd. has provided an update on the status of share transfer requests received for the month ended 31st December 2025. This update comes in response to the SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/MIRSD/MIRSD-PoD/P/CIR/2025/97. The company has confirmed the processing and approval status of the requests. Additionally, Keerthi Industries has reminded shareholders to dematerialize their securities within 120 days of this letter, as per the SEBI Gazette Notification ne SEBI /LAD-NRO/GN/2022/66 dated January 24, 2022.

  • Keerthi Industries provides update on share transfer requests under SEBI special window.
  • Company confirms processing and approval status of requests for December 2025.
  • Shareholders reminded to dematerialize securities within 120 days as per SEBI guidelines.
  • SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/MIRSD/MIRSD-PoD/P/CIR/2025/97 is the reference point for this update.
  • SEBI Gazette Notification ne SEBI /LAD-NRO/GN/2022/66 dated January 24, 2022, mandates securities to be issued in demat mode only.

item.title: [ACCELERATE] Acceleratebs India Ltd Approves USD 1 Million Investment in Wholly-Owned Subsidiary Accelerate Next Inc
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Acceleratebs India Ltd announced the approval of a significant investment of up to USD 1,000,000 (United States Dollar One Million Only) in its wholly-owned subsidiary, Accelerate Next Inc, incorporated in Wyoming, United States of America. The investment will be made by subscribing to the equity shares of the subsidiary. item.title: [SAFFRON] Saffron Industries Ltd. Re-Appoints Mr. Manoj Rameshwar Sinha as Whole-time Director
item.description:
Saffron Industries Ltd. has announced the re-appointment of Mr. Manoj Rameshwar Sinha as Whole-time Director for a period of three years, effective from January 06, 2026, subject to the approval of the Shareholders at the ensuing General Meeting. Mr. Sinha, a Commerce graduate, brings over 20 years of experience in property acquisition, development, and management. He has been instrumental in strategic leadership, market analysis, financial acumen, stakeholder relations, and driving innovation in sustainability. His re-appointment is based on the recommendations of the Nomination and Remuneration Committee and the approval of the Board of Directors.

  • Re-appointment of Mr. Manoj Rameshwar Sinha as Whole-time Director
  • Re-appointment for a further period of three years
  • Mr. Sinha's extensive experience in property acquisition, development, and management
  • His role in strategic leadership, market analysis, and financial acumen
  • Subject to the approval of the Shareholders at the ensuing General Meeting

item.title: [UNIROYAL] Uniroyal Industries' Promoter, Rashmi Mahajan, to Acquire 8.63% Shares via Gift from Son
item.description:
Uniroyal Industries Ltd. has received disclosure from Mrs. Rashmi Mahajan, a promoter and part of the promoter group, intending to acquire 713475 equity shares from her son, Mr. Abhay Mahajan, also a part of the promoter group, through inter se transfer of shares on 10/01/2026. This being an inter se transfer amongst promoter group and immediate relative, it falls within the exception under regulation 10(1)(a)(i) and 10(1)(a)(ii). The transfer is in the nature of gift, and the aggregate holding of promoter and promoter group before and after the above inter se transfer of shares remains the same.

  • Mrs. Rashmi Mahajan, a promoter of Uniroyal Industries Ltd., intends to acquire 713475 equity shares from her son, Mr. Abhay Mahajan, who is also a part of the promoter group.
  • The transfer of shares is by way of gift, and no consideration is being paid.
  • The proposed acquisition date is 10/01/2026.
  • The acquisition is exempt from making an open offer under SEBI (Substantial Acquisition of Shares and Takeovers) Regulations, 2011.
  • The acquirer, Mrs. Rashmi Mahajan, has complied with the necessary disclosure requirements in Regulation 10(5) of SEBI (SAST) Regulation, 2011.

item.title: [JRELTD] EbixCash, Lotus India Pay Launch Co-Branded Legend Card to Enhance Payment Experience
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

EbixCash, the Indian flagship subsidiary of Eraaya Lifespaces Ltd, has partnered with Lotus India Pay to launch the Legend Card, a co-branded prepaid card. This strategic move strengthens EbixCash's prepaid and digital payments portfolio and enhances the shopping and lifestyle experience of Lotus India Pay customers. The Legend Card is designed to support point-of-sale transactions, e-commerce purchases, QR-based payments, and UPI-linked usage, enabling seamless cashless transactions. The card is made for today's digitally inclined customers who seek secure, convenient, and seamless payment solutions.

item.title: [JSTL] Jeevan Scientific Technology Ltd Receives Disclosure for Substantial Acquisition of Shares by Sushma Bangad, Shradha Bangad, Pranali Bangad, and Alpha Financials
item.description:
Jeevan Scientific Technology Ltd has received a disclosure under Regulation 29(1) of SEBI (Substantial Acquisition of Shares & Takeovers) Regulations, 2011. The disclosure is for the acquisition of shares by Sushma Bangad, Shradha Bangad, Pranali Bangad, and Alpha Financials. The acquisition was made through a preferential issue (Cash basis) on 02-01-2026. The total shares acquired amount to 15,00,000, which is 7.54% of the total diluted share/voting capital of the company.

  • Acquisition of 15,00,000 shares by Sushma Bangad, Shradha Bangad, Pranali Bangad, and Alpha Financials
  • The acquisition was made through a preferential issue (Cash basis) on 02-01-2026
  • The total shares acquired represent 7.54% of the total diluted share/voting capital of the company
  • The acquisition does not involve any encumbrance or warrants/convertible securities
  • The total share capital/voting capital after the acquisition is Rs, 19,91,89,650 divided into 1,99,18,965 equit shares of Rs. 10/- each
